 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָתַי‎</span><sub>43</sub> **interrogative adverb** ==when?== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***mati:***</u></abbr> in Late Hebrew and Aramaic with the interrogative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵימָתִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵימָת‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), in OT only of future time: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** alone, [[Gen.30.30|Gen 30:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָתַי אעשׂה גם אנכי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לביתי‎</span> ***when*** shall I also do, etc.? [[Amos.8.5|Amos 8:5]]; [[Ps.41.6|Ps 41:6]]; [[Ps.42.3|Ps 42:3]]; [[Ps.94.8|Ps 94:8]]; [[Ps.101.2|Ps 101:2]]; [[Ps.119.82|Ps 119:82]]; [[Ps.119.84|Ps 119:84]]; [[Prov.6.9|Prov 6:9]] b [[Prov.23.35|Prov 23:35]]; [[Job.7.4|Job 7:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָתַי אָקוּם‎</span>, [[Neh.2.6|Neh 2:6]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמָתַי‎</span> ***against when?*** [[Exod.8.5|Exod 8:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמָתַי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַעְתִּיר‎</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדמָֿתַי‎</span> ***until when? how long?*** followed by imperfect [[Exod.10.7|Exod 10:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עד מתי יהיה זה לנו למוקשׁ‎</span>, [[1Sam.1.14|1Sam 1:14]]; [[Jer.4.14|Jer 4:14]]; [[Jer.4.21|Jer 4:21]]; [[Ps.74.10|Ps 74:10]]; [[Ps.82.2|Ps 82:2]]; [[Ps.94.3|Ps 94:3]]; [[Prov.1.22|Prov 1:22]] +, followed by participle1 Sam [[Prov.16.1|Prov 16:1]]; [[1Kgs.18.21|1Kgs 18:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדמָֿתַי אַתֶּם פֹּסְחִים עַלשְֿׁתֵּי הַסְּעִפִּים‎</span>, followed by perfect [[Exod.10.3|Exod 10:3]]; [[Ps.80.5|Ps 80:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד מָתַי לֹא‎</span> [[2Sam.2.26|2Sam 2:26]]; [[Hos.8.5|Hos 8:5]]; [[Zech.1.12|Zech 1:12]] alone, [[Isa.6.11|Isa 6:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֹמַר עַדמָֿתַי אֲדֹנָי‎</span>, [[Hab.2.6|Hab 2:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺי הַמַּרְבֶּה לֹאלֿוֺ עַדמָֿתַי‎</span>; with an aposiop., [[Ps.6.4|Ps 6:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדמָֿתָ֑י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאַתָּה י‎</span>, [[Ps.90.13|Ps 90:13]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי מָתַי עוֺד‎</span>, ***after how long yet?*** [[Jer.13.27|Jer 13:27]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְתִים‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַת‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַתְכֹּ֫נֶת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תכן‎</span>. above, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַתְּלָאָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלָאָה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְתַלְּעוֺת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלע‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְתֹם‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תמם‎</span>; [[Judg.20.48|Judg 20:48]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַת‎</span>.
